remarks: The left limit doesn't change if the function is restricted to a smaller open interval.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
limcresiooub.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
limcresiooub.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR* ) $.
limcresiooub.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
limcresiooub.bltc $e |- ( ph -> B < C ) $.
limcresiooub.bcss $e |- ( ph -> ( B (,) C ) C_ A ) $.
limcresiooub.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR* ) $.
limcresiooub.cled $e |- ( ph -> D <_ B ) $.
limcresiooub $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F |` ( B (,) C ) ) limCC C ) = ( ( F |` ( D (,) C ) ) limCC C ) ) $.
